name: a-parkour-lypse
description:
Created for the 2020 winter DevICT game jam. Jump, slide, climb, and wall run your way to the end of the city as the buildings fall apart in around you.

Controls;

WASD to move

Space bar to Jump

left control or left shift to crouch/slide

left click to place a platform

R restarts the level

Rightclick to grab the mouse, esc to release it.

Switching maps: backspace = tutorial, f12 = Main map, f11 = Playground map.
